data.title: King Faruk and Queen Farida of Egypt after their wedding
meta_keywords: king faruk queen farida egypt wedding
data.meta_description: Prints of King Faruk(1920-1965) and his bride at the banquet given at the Koubbeh Palace in Cairo
data.text:
King Faruk(1920-1965) and his bride at the banquet given at the Koubbeh Palace in Cairo: an occasion when Queen Farida discarded the veil she had worn during the marriage ceremonies. King Faruk was not yet 18 when the marriage took place; the couple divorced in 1948. Mary Evans Picture Library makes available wonderful images created for people to enjoy over the centuries. © Mary Evans Picture Library 2015 - https://copyrighthub.org/s0/hub1/creation/maryevans/MaryEvansPictureID/10487764

Media ID 4484051

1938 Banquet Bride Farida Farouk Faruk Veil January

Framed Prints

Introducing the exquisite Framed Prints from Media Storehouse, featuring the iconic image of King Fuad I and Queen Farida of Egypt, captured after their lavish wedding banquet at the Koubbeh Palace in Cairo. This stunning photograph, sourced from Mary Evans Prints Online, showcases the royal couple in a rare moment of relaxation and joy, with Queen Farida having discarded the veil she wore during the marriage ceremonies. Each Framed Print is meticulously crafted with high-quality materials, providing a timeless and elegant addition to any home or office decor. Bring a touch of history and royal charm to your space with this beautiful and authentic piece.

Photo Prints

Experience a piece of history with our exquisite photographic print from Media Storehouse. This stunning image captures the moment of celebration after the wedding of King Farouk and Queen Farida of Egypt. Taken at the grand banquet held at the Koubbeh Palace in Cairo, this print showcases the newlyweds in all their regal splendor. With Queen Farida having discarded her wedding veil, the photograph beautifully encapsulates the joy and excitement of their union. Add a touch of royal elegance to your home or office with this timeless, rights-managed print from Mary Evans Prints Online, exclusively available at Media Storehouse.

Poster Prints

Introducing the captivating "King Farouk and Queen Farida of Egypt" poster print from Media Storehouse's exclusive collection. This stunning image, sourced from Mary Evans Prints Online, captures the essence of a historic moment: the newlywed royal couple at their wedding banquet in Cairo, 1950. In this enchanting photograph, King Farouk, the last king of Egypt, and his radiant bride, Queen Farida, share a moment of joy and celebration. The image is particularly noteworthy as it marks the moment when Queen Farida removed her veil, symbolizing the beginning of their marital journey together. Bring the allure of ancient Egypt into your home or office with this exquisite poster print. The high-quality print showcases the intricate details and rich colors of the original photograph, making it a captivating addition to any space. Experience the magic of history with Media Storehouse's "King Farouk and Queen Farida of Egypt" poster print – a perfect blend of elegance, romance, and history.

Jigsaw Puzzles

Experience the rich history and culture of Egypt with our exquisite jigsaw puzzle from Media Storehouse. This beautiful puzzle features the iconic image of King Farouk and Queen Farida after their wedding, captured in the regal setting of Koubbeh Palace in Cairo. Witness the memorable moment when Queen Farida discarded her wedding veil at their grand banquet. With intricately detailed pieces and vibrant colors, this puzzle is a captivating challenge for puzzle enthusiasts of all ages. Travel back in time and immerse yourself in the history and elegance of ancient Egypt, one piece at a time.
